concept.title: Import File
concept.shortdesc: After you have copied the appropriate data into the classifications template file, you can import (upload) into Adobe data collection servers.

conbody.note: You do not need to download (using the export feature) your existing classification data before uploading new data. You only need to upload a new file containing the new rows of data. This method improves performance.
conbody.p:
See
for important information about the structure and limitations of uploaded files.
See Common Classification Upload Issues for troubleshooting help.
